title: Mystery Numbers?
body: What exactly are the numbers just above each teams' KDAs at the post-game lobby scoreboard. It's in a yellow-white font. Thanks

replies.body: Also, the one with the glow behind it is the result of the match you just played. So if you had 230 wins and 241 losses and you won that game, the 230 would become 231 and would have a glow/Gaussian blur effect behind it

Each team's total kda?

Or your win/loss?

One of them is the one you're referring to.

Yeah this is just a photo i picked off the internet it's the numbers above the KDAs. 54 and 49 what do they represent?[Image](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=68798&d=1377910534)

http://i.imgur.com/KvK2E.jpg

On this picture, 600 is the amount of wins he has (yellow) and the other is his losses (white).
Right Right cool thanks man really appreciate it no one has bothered to tell me after a match.
You'd be referring to the win/loss ratio for your account in that queue.
